definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
(idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour

sentences.english: Today I receive salary RMB 0000 from Modim Fashion Corporation Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 今收到牧鼎服饰公司工资0000元整。

sentences.english: Self-publishing these days is increasingly a tale of two cities.
sentences.chinese: 今自助出版越来越呈现两极分化的趋势。

sentences.english: However, that implies that ancient China may loom larger in my mind than it should compared to modern China.
sentences.chinese: 不过这可能意味着我头脑里的中国古多于今。

sentences.english: And to be called a Lamb of God.
The zen influences more tremendous to China from of old.
sentences.chinese: 自古到今，禅宗对中国的影响是巨大的。

sentences.english: I am breathing in Thy answers, Stilling every doubt and fear.
sentences.chinese: 我今呼入你的答复，平静疑惑和惊恐。

sentences.english: Her voice gets on my nerves.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音今我头皮发麻。

sentences.english: This rule of the Chengguan District of Lanzhou City East Gangzhen, under the Longxi County.
sentences.chinese: 治所在今兰州市城关区东岗镇，隶属陇西郡。

sentences.english: I come back now, Snow bends the bough.
I have this right mindfulness, said Tathagata name, Lime Road, survive the Pure Land.
sentences.chinese: 我今正念，称如来名，为菩提道，求生净土。

sentences.english: Thanks for your kindness, deity Moon, the joy belongs to the others!
sentences.chinese: 月儿好心今谢过，且将厚意属别人。

sentences.english: This morning rise teacher Li seek me and say that your form master asks you to while come back.
sentences.chinese: 今早上李老师找我，说你们班主任问你什么时候回来。

sentences.english: Come adore, on bended knee, Christ the Lord the newborn King.
sentences.chinese: 屈膝跪拜新生王，救主基督今降生。

sentences.english: The clock tower affair has set the alarm bells ringing.
sentences.chinese: 今次天星钟楼事件，为港府吸纳民意的机制敲响警钟。

sentences.english: Mr. Johnson: Bre you using you mower thellos afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊师长教师今全国午你筹办用割草机吗？

sentences.english: My head had just started its protest this morning, by pulling my back to reality from my la-la-land.
sentences.chinese: 头不知为何的今早把我从梦里拉回到现实。

definition: old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
seat of the principal county magistrate in imperial China
seat of prefectural government (from Tang to Qing times)
dates of birth and death (of historical figure)
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote
